mapper.select: select s.store_name, r.review_time, r.score, r.comment_time from review r join store s on s.seq=r.store_seq where r.user_id=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into review(store_seq, user_id, score, review, review_time) values (#{store_seq}, #{user_id}, #{score}, #{review}, #{review_time})
